title: Fonts in this Logo
content:
Hi,

Does anybody know what fonts are being used in this logo?

thanks  
-Dave

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905210747im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/deephavenlow_3916.jpg)

 [‹ Font ID Please](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905210747/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39450 "Go to previous forum topic") [Chromeo tall slender font ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905210747/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39445 "Go to next forum topic")
author: popinfresh

comments.content:
TOWNHOMES is Bank Gothic

DEEPHAVEN COVE looks almost like Adobe Serif (the substitution font)
I think “townhomes” might actually be Eurostile, stretched.
... and you could drive a SUV through the A and V. :)
The unbelievably poor kerning was what tipped me off to it being Adobe Serif. Pretty embarrassing if that’s their actual logo - but I hope it’s just a case of not embedding fonts.
